doc.title: Fridge
doc.plot: Filmmakers Brian L. Perkins and Jason Blalock take to the streets of San Francisco with a simple mission: get people to compose fridge magnet poetry. What follows is a uniquely frank discussion regarding the significance of an increasingly rarefied literary art. With the streets supplying a diverse range of pedestrians/poets, Fridge is a testament to the thoughtfulness and eloquence of your average passerby.
